name: Hode The Line
description:
Hode The Line is a new Strategy game where you get to defend your castle against WAVES of monsters

It was a fine day in the Kingdom of Baboland. People were getting on with their happy lives within the Kingdom until the Goblin and Monsters came knocking on their doors! The Monsters are coming and coming in HARD! Build your army and stop them at all cost!

Build your army with a number of different type of soldiers. Each type of soldiers have their own unique features

Defend your castle and don't let the Monsters destroy it! Just like the soldiers, every type of monsters have their own unique features.


Come up with ideas and tactics to hold the enemy and keep them away from your Castle.

Unlimited waves of monsters and each wave gets harder. How many waves of monsters can you survive? Let put your skills to the test!
